titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the C. F. Remer papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives staff

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2018-03-26T15:41-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: March 26, 2018: Revised to include description from photofile. - Paige Davenport
Added links to materials from the 2018 release of records subseries that are available on digitalcollections.hoover.org. -Sally DeBauche
Revised to update encoding by Samira Bozorgi
PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::C. F. Remer Papers)//EN" "remerchf.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

physdesc.extent: 40 manuscript boxes, 4 card file boxes, 7 envelopes, 1 album box, 6 phonorecords

did.abstract: Correspondence, writings, notes, studies, speeches, clippings, and printed matter relating to the political and economic development of the Far East, especially China. Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection open for research. Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items, computer media, and digital files. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos, films, or digital files during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], C. F. Remer papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1972.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

altformavail.head: Alternate Forms Available
altformavail.p: Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

did.unittitle: Application for Fulbright Fellowship to lecture in Taiwan,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Manuscripts, drafts, research notes, correspondence, book reviews, clippings, and printed matter, relating to C.F. Remer's writings and research projects, arranged chronologically by year of publication or composition.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Reports, studies, conference papers, correspondence, notes, clippings, and printed matter, arranged alphabetically by subject.

scopecontent.p: Certificates of award, degrees, memorabilia, clippings, printed matter, notebooks, and card files.
